# a small notes app in FastAPI

this repo contains a step by step construction of a FastAPI / websockets app, rendered with codehike

[![oneline website](https://img.shields.io/badge/online%20website-Color?style=flat)](https://backend-fastapi-notes.info-mines.paris)
[![Built with Next.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Built%20with-Next.js-000000?logo=nextdotjs&logoColor=white)](https://nextjs.org/)
[![Built with CodeHike](https://img.shields.io/badge/and%20with-CodeHike-000000?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=white)](https://github.com/code-hike/codehike)
